data.persona: I get paid to fight. I am tough and rowdy. I have a very short temper.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's a wooden table, an ornate chair, and a painting. here.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an suit of armor.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the wooden table so that I hide beneath it.
data.mid_motivation: I have been hired by a ghost, a vengeful spirit, to kill a certain servant in the Dining Hall who had served the ghost poison when they used to be human.
data.long_motivation: I will get jobs that will let me fight and earn more money.
